title: Textile, 1805–10
medium: Technique: Plain weave foundation. Block printing for the two browns. Yellow and blue applied by brush. (used together for green). Note brown block marks at left edge. The blue dots are spilled indigo.
dimensions:
warp: 230 cm (90 1/2 in) by weft: (selvedge to selvedge) 65cm (25 3/4 in.)
Pattern: Half-drop repeat.                                                          Minimum unit; 15 by 13 in.                                                 Fabric also repeats edge to edge as a half-drop.
description: tree trunk with leaves and flowers in brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1805–10.
1805–10. Technique: Plain weave foundation. Block printing for the two browns. Yellow and blue applied by brush. (used together for green). Note brown block marks at left edge. The blue dots are spilled indigo.. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-127.
